channel.title: TFoL Game One | Unseen - Day 1 | (16/16)
channel.description:
## Welcome
## [color=#5c8f66]T[/color][color=#5e9268]h[/color][color=#60966b]i[/color][color=#62996d]s[/color] [color=#66a071]i[/color][color=#68a374]s[/color] [color=#6ca978]m[/color][color=#6ead7b]y[/color] [color=#72b37f]m[/color][color=#74b681]o[/color][color=#75b883]d[/color][color=#77bb85]c[/color][color=#79be87]o[/color][color=#7bc189]l[/color][color=#7dc48b]o[/color][color=#7ec68d]r[/color][color=#80c98f],[/color] [color=#7ec593]n[/color][color=#7abe94]o[/color][color=#75b796]b[/color][color=#71b097]o[/color][color=#6da999]d[/color][color=#69a39b]y[/color] [color=#60959e]e[/color][color=#5c8e9f]l[/color][color=#5887a1]s[/color][color=#56849d]e[/color] [color=#527d95]i[/color][color=#507a91]s[/color] [color=#4c748a]t[/color][color=#4a7186]o[/color] [color=#466a7e]u[/color][color=#44677a]s[/color][color=#426476]e[/color] [color=#3d5d6f]i[/color][color=#3b5a6b]t[/color][color=#395767].[/color]
## [color=#375463]-[/color] [color=#324d5c]P[/color][color=#304a58]u[/color][color=#2e4754]g[/color]
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen will talk through the FoL Tournament Discord server Priest will speak to the dead through the FoL Tournament Discord server Only classes that can spawn in Unseen games will be used, and will be used as they are found here: [ToL Class Cards Thread](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent through a forum poll After the votes are revealed, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day
###After The Night You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed **Day:** You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### Rolelist: **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Sheriff[/color]** **[color=steblue]Physician[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **/** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **/** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]**
Players: 1. PKR - Alive 2. Sam17z - Alive 3. techwolves - Alive 4. Damafaud - Alive 5. tbone30 - Alive 6. MtheJoker Alive - King 7. Icibalus - Alive 8. CheesyKnives - Alive 9. Insanity - Alive 10. Whammerist - Alive 11. Braixen - Alive 12. Frostwolf103 - Alive 13. Firekitten - Alive 14. Vandalay - Alive 15. Jabub - Alive 16. PoisonedSquid - Alive
### Graveyard *oh hey, graveyard's pretty clean*
### Timestamps: [Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/tfol-game-one-unseen-day-1-16-16/60867/2?u=pug)

Can we call it, like, FoL Tournament? Or FoLT? Or something? idk but T usually stands for Tiny

Anyways welcome to @Vandalay, @Jabub, and @tbone30

I wish there were more new faces, but it’s good to have you along!
